title: Contact detail
description: A means of contacting an entity

label.title: Label
label.description: A human-readable label for the contact detail

type.title: Type
type.description: A type of medium, e.g. 'fax' or 'email'

value.title: Value
value.description: A value, e.g. a phone number or email address

note.title: Note
note.description: A note, e.g. for grouping contact details by physical location

valid_from.title: Valid from
valid_from.description: The date from which the contact detail is valid

valid_until.title: Valid until
valid_until.description: The date from which the contact detail is no longer valid
